text: Bek roh taseumah tuhan nyang laen Takheun na laen sajan ngon Allah Hana meusidroe pih laen Tuhan Meulengkan Tuhan nyang Maha Murah Nyang laen bandum meuhat binasa Nyang han binasa sit sidroe Allah Seugala hukom bak Tuhan keu droe Gata pih tawoe bandum bak Allah a e e e A a AL-â€˜ANKABUT (RAMBIDEUEN) Ngon nama Allah lon peuphon surat Tuhan Hadharat nyang Maha Murah Tuhanku Sidroe geumaseh that-that Donya akhirat rahmat Neulimpah
